The original Half-Life. I have beaten this game multiple times, and I have to say that other than the graphics this game has aged quite well. The gunplay, AI, movement, is all pretty good. I haven't played the multiplayer, but the single player was a fun experience all the way through. This is fun game that I believe everyone should complete at least once.

花了15.1个小时将这个游戏打通关，用了两天时间，之前早有听闻半条命系列的大名，但苦于小时候没有电脑所以一直希望有一天能玩上这个游戏。长大后偶然想起小时候的愿望，于是便抽空体验了一把，那么下面就来给大家讲讲我的通关感想：
1.这是一个名副其实的神作，无论从画质上还是剧情上。这样的画质之所以还能称作是神作，是因为这是一部在1998年发布的游戏，是世界上第一部真正意义上实现完全3D化的游戏。
2.游戏的难度实在是太大了。整个通关过程我只在两处地方开了作弊，一个是地面惊魂那关的隧道开了穿墙(是因为BUG后面会讲到)，另一个是最后一关的BOSS战，我本来是抱着不开作弊凭一己之力干掉BOSS坐真男人的心态去打的，但是当我打了整整一个下午(大约四个小时）耗尽了所有弹药都没有打败。于是我带着被打大自闭的心态开了穿墙和无敌模式2分钟解决了战斗。如果第一次通关，想做到无作弊通关的，基本上是不可能实现的。除非你有强大的意志力和足够的耐心，要不然你会玩到自闭。
3.游戏中存在着一个会影响到游戏正常进行的BUG，在地面惊魂这一个关卡中，在关卡的结尾会穿过一个隧道，在隧道中走一段路后会自动存档，当存档过后你就会发现你无法操纵游戏进行活动，只能开启穿墙模式移动到可活动区域才行，希望官方能早日修复这个BUG。
好了，这就是我想说的关于这个游戏的一切，感谢您能完整的看完我所写的感想！

                                                                                                                                          至所有喜爱半条命的朋友

It’s like the prequels prequel to watching paint dry, but the paint is really just two half naked dudes fighting over a jar of green olives. This game is pretty fire. My only complaint is why Gman never removes his shirt… 15/10 #1 Valve game.

This game absolute rules. It's genuinely impressive how much of the game still holds up today. The puzzles and exploration are where this game shines. I loved searching every inch of Black Mesa and finding extra equipment to aid me. The weapons are also pretty fun to play around with. Despite the game's age, I did not have too many issues with the allied AI either. The enemies are generally fun to fight against. I preferred the human enemies personally.

Performance wise, the game runs smoothly but the loading areas can be pretty jarring. I thought the story was pretty nice. It wasn't anything too crazy or mind-blowing, but it was pretty solid.

The game does fall off in the endgame. The alien world is such a slog and it was frustrating at times. I thought the aliens were cool and mysterious from a story standpoint, and it's a darn shame the alien world was as boring and frustrating as it was. The platforming of this game is by far the worst part of the entire game. At no point was it fun to platform, but it could just be the game's age. The headcrab queen thing and Nihilanth were really tedious boss fights. 

Despite the Half-Life's faults and age, it is still a fun experience and downright impressive at times. I would highly recommend this game.

Apart from a few dated design choices this is the ultimate old school FPS experience. There's really nothing to say about the original Half-Life that hasn't already been said.

H λ L F - L I F E, although released back in 1998, and might be despised by its aged graphics, it's still an amazing game in my eyes. Follow the role of Gordon Freeman, a quiet nerd who is running late at Black Mesa. Originally it being a normal work day, a failed experiment goes wrong and aliens start appearing around the large building. Now, your job is to survive with whatever weapons you have, and get the hell out. If you're thinking of getting it, buy it. It's worth it, and the ending is as confusing as ever like the rest of the game, but in a good way.

Holy crap this game is fantastic, it holds up surprisingly well. There are a few wonky stuff but its expected for a 20 year old game. Awsome game def worth a play!

Mark this one down as a "you had to be there" game because my experience has been mostly unpleasant. Half-Life consistently violates game design principles: bad platforming, unfair enemy placement, and occasionally, an unclear path of progression partially due to the low-detail objects and environments. Quick save and load is a necessary but band-aid solution to dealing with the level design of HL1.  Gunplay lacks the satisfaction of modern first person shooter titles and the setting loses its appeal after the first hour or so. The appeal of a fully 3D rendered DirectX 6-era game with lip-synced voice acting doesn't hold weight over 20 years later.
Наконец прошел первую халву спустя более 20 лет после выхода. На удивление, все еще годно.
Absolutely fantastic milestone of a game. Maybe skip the last few chapters. 9.5/10 total masterpiece

Half-life 1. Uma obra-prima, mas que infelizmente envelheceu. Por mais que minha nota seja um 6/10, eu adorei esse jogo, obviamente observando o quão incrível ele foi em 98, e reconhecendo o quão importante ele foi para o gênero e para a indústria. 

Minha experiência apesar de certos momentos sendo estressantes, foi até bem divertida, recomendo bastante esse jogo para quem curte jogos retrô, e principalmente fãs de FPS, mas saiba que na minha opinião é um jogo que não envelheceu muito bem, então pode não ser lá uma boa experiência para alguns.

Recomendo também, apesar de eu não ter jogado, dar uma olhada no Black Mesa, o remake de Half-life 1 feito por fãs, que está disponível na Steam. Talvez seja uma porta de entrada melhor para Half-life para alguns jogadores novos.

Essa é a primeira análise que estou fazendo aqui na Steam, então se pude ajudar fico muito feliz :-)

Fun game, old graphics, pioneer in early FPS genre, lots of weapons to kill things with. Me likey.

Good game, though definitely a bit dated in a number of ways. But if you're fine with older games, or are willing to be lenient, I think it's well worth playing, especially considering how cheap you can pick it up on sale.
